summary: The Colossal Black Soul Gem makes a return from Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that adds the Colossal Black Soul Gem created by Mannimarco himself from Oblivion. It\'s a simple retexture of a Grand Soul Gem, nothing really special, but I thought a few people might like this.

It\'s a reusable soul gem like Azura\'s Star and the Black Star, so you can use it over and over again.

As you can see in the pictures, you can find it in the Arch Mage\'s Quarters at the College of Winterhold.

If you have any problems, please let me know.
author: YamiMarik1994
